page.title: 20Clubs
page.content:
Although there are no facilities for clubs in the immediate area, many of the residents belong to clubs and organisations in the neighbourhood. For children of primary school age there is a Brownie pack which meets weekly at Murroes School. There is a Parent-Teacher Association at the school, which is open to the parents of all pupils. The Women's Rural Institute meet in their own premises in Westhall Terrace, and this hall is also used by the Senior Citizens' Club.
The information for this project was compiled jointly by the staff and pupils of Mattocks School, Wellbank and Murroes School, Duntrune, in June, 1985.
